document.full_text: the chinese government is considering offering financial incentives to people to voluntarily donate organs, state media said on monday, as the country tries to tackle the problem of demand for transplants outstripping supply.
document.title: china considers financial incentives to promote organ donation
lines_and_colors: the chinese government is considering offering financial incentives to people to voluntarily donate organs, state media said on monday, as the country tries to tackle the problem of demand for transplants outstripping supply.
